description: This Kotlin source file defines the 'Category' data class for a expense tracker application. The class models transaction categories such as 'Salary' or 'Food' with properties like ID, title, color, and expense indicator. It includes a companion object with a method to toggle the expense/income status.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Data class representing a transaction category with properties for ID, title, color, and expense indicator.

methods.name: Category.asToggledExpense
methods.description: Extension function inside companion object that creates a copy of the category with the 'isExpense' property toggled.
